353220.name: Fast Detect
353220.description:
The experimental graphic story Fast Detect takes place in the postapocalyptic Half-Life 2 universe and is shown from the artist's special point of view.
The players usually rush along, forgetful of everything, caught in perilous skirmishes and long fights and sometimes not even noticing how deep the meaning of their surroundings is:
Unique architectural forms, complexes of facilities and diversity of flora, mysterious play of light and chilling, piercing sound.
Take a stop, come to your senses and look around: this may help you and even save your life.
353220.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 俄语, 保加利亚语, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 匈牙利语, 希腊语, 丹麦语, 繁体中文, 简体中文, 韩语, 挪威语, 波兰语, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙, 罗马尼亚语, 泰语, 土耳其语, 乌克兰语, 芬兰语, 捷克语, 瑞典语, 日语
*具有完全音频支持的语言
